title: TOMAHAWK Black Prince Medieval Sword with Sheath - Historical Reproduction, Stainless Steel Blade, Cast Metal Handle with TPU Grip, for Reenactors and Performances - 22 1/2" Length
description: This fine replica is patterned after a medieval broadsword and will be enjoyed by collectors and reenactors alike! This item features a stainless steel 17" blade and offers a cast metal handle with an ornate guard and pommel along with a black composite grip. This sword measures 22 1/2" overall and includes a coordinating black sheath. Tomahawk, XL1122.
